translated: You have already been able to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and now you are able to ask about the causes for producing great wisdom, the causes for eliminating the suffering of birth and death, the causes for going to the great treasure island of omniscience, the causes for accomplishing the indestructible vehicle of the Mahayana, the causes for being far removed from the fear of the two vehicles and being afraid of birth and death, the causes for abiding in various samÄdhis and giving rise to wisdom, the causes for thoroughly practicing the subtle practices of bodhisattvas, the causes for riding the great vehicle of vows and traveling the pure path of bodhisattva practices, the causes for adorning the pure path of indestructible wisdom with bodhisattva practices, the causes for universally observing all buddhas of the ten directions without obstruction, and the causes for the pure path of quickly being able to enter the profound wisdom ocean of all buddhas.
Good man!
I, in the great city of Luminous Palace on the seashore, purely cultivate the bodhisattva practice of the banner of great compassion.
Good man!
I universally observe the poor beings in JambudvÄ«pa. For the sake of benefiting them, I cultivate various practices, fulfilling their wishes.

First, I satisfy their minds with worldly treasures and food and drink, and then I give them the wealth of the Dharma to delight them. I cause them to cultivate meritorious practices, to give rise to the path of wisdom, to increase the power of their roots of goodness, to give rise to the mind of enlightenment, to purify the vows of enlightenment, to strengthen the power of great compassion, to cultivate the path that can extinguish birth and death, to give rise to the practice of not abandoning birth and death, to embrace the ocean of beings, to cultivate the ocean of merits, to illuminate the ocean of dharmas, to see the ocean of buddhas, and to enter the ocean of omniscience.
Good man!
I dwell here in this way, thinking like this, intending like this, diligently seeking like this, benefiting like this, and bringing peace and happiness to all beings like this.
Good man!
I know all the treasure islands, all the treasure places, all the treasure natures, all the treasure roots, all the treasure kinds, and all the treasure categories in the ocean;
Moreover, I can purify all treasures, drill all treasures, produce all treasures, make all treasures, all treasure vessels, all treasure uses, all treasure realms, and the radiance of all treasures.

I also know the whirlpools, depths, waves, distances, water colors, and various differences of the great ocean;

I am also skilled in distinguishing the movements of the sun, moon, stars, constellations, their running and turning, the number of their courses, the calamities and omens, the length of the day and night, and the duration of time;

I also know the ship's iron and wood, whether they are strong or brittle, whether the machinery is smooth or rough, the size of the water, whether the wind is favorable or adverse, the safe and dangerous aspects of turning left and right, whether to proceed or stop.
I always use such various skillful means to benefit all sentient beings.
Good man!
I use my fine ship to transport the merchants along the safe path, showing them the peaceful and fearless aspects;

I also expound the Dharma for them, causing them to rejoice. According to their desires, I lead them to the treasure island and provide them with various precious treasures until they are fully satisfied. Then I take them back to JambudvÄ«pa.
Good man!

I have been going and coming in this great ship like this from the past until now, and it has never been damaged. If any sentient beings get to see my body and hear my Dharma, I will cause them to be forever unafraid of the ocean of birth and death, to be able to enter the ocean of omniscience, to be able to exhaust all the oceans of craving and desire, to be able to illuminate the ocean of the three times with the light of wisdom, to be able to end the ocean of suffering of all sentient beings, to be able to purify the ocean of the minds of all sentient beings, to be able to quickly purify the ocean of all lands, to be able to go to the ocean of buddhas in all directions, to be able to know the ocean of faculties of all sentient beings, to be able to understand the ocean of practices of all sentient beings, and to be able to accord with the ocean of natures of all sentient beings.
Good man!

I only attain this practice of the banner of great compassion. If there are sentient beings who see, hear, think of, or dwell with me, all of it is not in vain. How could I know or speak of their practices and merits?
Good son!
To the south of here there is a city called Joyful Ornaments;
within it there is an elder named Supreme. You should go ask him how to learn the bodhisattva practices and cultivate the bodhisattva path.
At that time, the youth Sudhana paid homage at the feet of the ship captain, circumambulated him innumerable times, gazed up at him with earnest admiration, and wept with tears streaming down.
He was never tired of seeking out spiritual friends, and his mind of longing and delight for spiritual friends increased. He contemplated single-mindedly and then took his leave.
